Mobile versiyonunu ilk çıktığından beri oynuyorum pc versiyonunu almam için bilgisayar gerekliydi bilgisayar aldım ve cadılar bayramı indirimi ile 14tlye satın aldım. Grafikler mükemmel fizik mükemmel oyun gayet heyecanlı fakat Mobile versiyonundan daha zor olduğunu düşünüyorum özellikle reflex gerektiren ; iyileştirirken , jeneratör çözerken ve ayağa kaldırırken hızlıca beyaz noktaya getirmek mobil versiyondan daha zor.

Bir de çoğu yorumda gördüğünüz gibi yalnız başına oynanması 2-3 saat sonra sıkabilir ama yine de bu göreceli ben henüz sıkılmadım.

Oyunun mobile versiyonuna puanım : 8/10
Oyunun pc versiyonuna puanım : 9/10
me encanta hacer jugar a mi novio este juego  10 DE 10 y ahora que los 2 tenemos pc jugamos juntos <3
You can be a toxic survivor. 10/10 would recommend!!!
make survivor great again, the killers are too OP

A wonderful game to play with friends.

The game has a wonderful way of presenting terror with mechanics that leave you within the grasp of the killer where you have to always be a step ahead, or as the killer, in a situation where you have to think ahead of survivors and close the gap.

The only problem would be with the repetitiveness of the gameplay as you begin to anticipate the tactics of your fellow survivors and killers , which cements a similar play style after a while.

Graphics are above average and the controls are simple enough.
its a fun game with a few bugs here and there and a small player base atleast in India. If you want some different characters you've got to pickup them DLC's but would'nt call it a pay to win.

이쪽 장르는 하는 사람만 하는 고인물들이 많은지라, 뭣 모르고 찍먹했다가는 크게 상처를 입는다. 어느정도 게임을 즐기기 위한 세팅을 하는데도, DLC를 사야된다거나, 블러드 포인트를 다량으로 모아야 되기 때문에 초반에 버텨야 되는 구간이 길다. 
버티고 나면 세팅도 되고 실력도 늘어 이 게임만의 오묘한 매력에 빠지겠지만, 오래 이 게임을 한 사람들조차 밸런스나 다인큐에서 오는 플레이의 스트레스를 감당하기 어려운 사람들도 많다. 간단하게 찍먹해보려면 사지 않는 걸 권장한다.
我只想说能不能段位相匹配
Игра очень крутая могу теперь играть с друзьями!

당신들은 불포작에 매말라 할거다 50번은 죽고 게임 익힐 생각해라 못하면 그 이상 죽는 거고 원래 이런 고인물 게임은 맞아가면서 배우는 거다.라고 170시간 데린이가 말했다.

Игра как была забагована в мрачную пизду, так и остается забагованным куском дерьма. Разработчики регулярно выкатывают уебанские дополнения для высасывания денег из немногочисленных игроков, не исправляя при этом прошлых косяков. Персонажи как застревали в камнях, так и продолжают застревать. Перки работают через раз, если работают вообще. Ах да! Оптимизация нового контента? Нахуя! И так сойдет! И похуй, что у тебя 2080ti! У всех должно тормозить на новых картах! Нашелся тут боярин хуев!
its very fun but also extremely anxiety inducing

Das spiel ist prinzipiell super der grosse knackpunkt liegt bei mir in dert communtity. Die meisten Killerspieler Tunneln/Campen was auch nicht unterbunden wird da die entwickler von Behavior selbst dies als spielstil akzeptieren. Unter den survivorn hat man sehr oft egospieler dabei die einem nicht helfen und sogar dem killer in der hoffnung nicht selbst dran glauben zu müssen tipp auf andere Survivor geben im grossen und ganzen sehr salty die community. Wer den chat ignorieren kann und Kyrillisch kann ist im vorteil da enorm viele Russen in diesem spiel unterwegs sind die sich auch nicht die mühe machen wollen englisch zu kommunizieren.
this game is the reason i cry myself to sleep at night

The game is fun, a bit confusing initially, but the YouTube community helps with how to play the game well. Killer is challenging at any rank, there's diversity in the types of survivors and maps you will be on which will bring new experiences in every game. Every killer has a different skill level, some easy to learn, and some painfully hard to learn, with a diverse options given to players for free. Survivor can be fun alone and with friends, there's so many ways to play survivor as you rely on your four perks, that are interchangable between survivors. Survivor is easy to learn hard to master, there are killers who can be more seasoned, and others who can be easily tricked. The game is very worth it, but can be easy to become tilted in, and can cause burnout.

This game WILL make you rage. Everyone is competitive, whether or not they admit it. You may start off casual, but once you reach higher ranks, the phrase "I just play for fun," will have no meaning. Despite the competitiveness, it is still an enjoyable game to play with friends or by yourself.
